item.description:
The membership has voted! The January Restaurant of the month is Pizzico Ristorante Italiano.

About the Restaurant of the Month:

What do you get when Francesco Mannino and Giuseppe Volo, two cousins from Palermo, Sicily, move to Nashua and open a restaurant? Some of the most mouth-wateringly delicious Italian food served anywhere in the region. Pizzico Ristorante Italiano, with locations in South Nashua and Merrimack, gives diners all the authentic flavors and tastes of Italy in a sleek, contemporary setting.

Serving lunch and dinner daily, Pizzico’s menu consists of specialty pizza, pasta, chicken, veal, and fish dishes, lunch specials, desserts, and a complete martini bar. Standout menu choices include the Shrimp Scampi Pizza, Chicken Picatta, Penne Matriciana, and the Taormina, a pizza topped with roasted peppers, thin-sliced sirloin steak, tomato sauce, mozzarella and just a touch of olive oil. Pizzico’s signature drink, an Espresso Martini, is made with Danesi espresso, tiramisu syrup and Van Gogh Double Espresso Vodka.

Comments from recent diners at Pizzico Merrimack indicate a bright future for this latest restaurant venture. “Pizzico offers many dishes on par with some of the 3- and 4-star restaurants in Boston’s North End for about half the price — and none of the travel and parking headache,” says one diner.

item.name: FAN Restaurant of the Month
